subject: how to settup pedals
description_text:
I have installed my pedals and don know how to set then up and they show up in game but are this 4 axis that keeps showing un and taking over stuck at 50% but the throttles is axis 1 break at axes 3 clutch at axis 3 and a random 4 axis that keeps popping p and taking over
Picture 1 is me being fast enough and getting the pedals to connect
picture 2 is what happens es when truy and add the petals it even worse on le mans ultimate cause every keybine turns ito axis 4

conversations.body_text: Hi MrBot 222,     You can go to the update interface and select “Manual Firmware Update”, then navigate to the pedals-firmware folder → pedals folder, and select the proxultra.sfu file to see if it resolves the issue.

What version of the app sould I use

On Tue, Jun 24, 2025 at 8:15 PM support@simsonn.com
Hi MrBot 222,  You can download version 2.0.8 of the software.
